title: WALL-E
description: In a future Earth, a solitary waste-collecting robot uncovers a plant that sparks a profound journey, unraveling themes of love, environmentalism, and the enduring spirit of humanity.

title: Onward
description: Set in a suburban fantasy realm, two elf brothers embark on a quest to resurrect their deceased father using a rare magical artifact, weaving a tale of humor, brotherhood, and the enchantment found within familial bonds.

title: Luca
description: Against the scenic Italian Riviera, a young sea monster named Luca forms an unlikely friendship during a transformative summer, challenging societal expectations and celebrating the power of authentic connections.

title: Frozen
description: Within a magical kingdom, the bond between royal sisters is tested when one sister's magical powers inadvertently plunge their realm into eternal winter, exploring themes of self-acceptance and sisterhood.

title: Aladdin
description: In the bustling city of Agrabah, a street-smart youth encounters a magical genie, embarking on a journey of self-discovery, love, and adventure amidst the vibrant Arabian nights.

title: Rio
description: A rare blue macaw named Blu experiences a thrilling adventure in Rio de Janeiro, navigating the colorful and lively streets while discovering the true meaning of freedom.

title: Soul
description: Navigating the afterlife, a passionate jazz musician named Joe Gardner explores profound questions of purpose, passion, and the joy found in life's ordinary moments, forming connections that transcend the boundaries of existence.
